name: Core Release 9.6
description: We are pleased to announce the release of new version of platform API version. The following list contains the enhancements and Bug fixes.

ADDED.text: Restrict number of email sending daily by setting up frequency option.
Custom expiration of email verifcation link
Custom validation rules option using Regex
Removed support of old insights API

FIXED.text: In rare case VK profile was coming with all null values
Email verifcation link issues with Hash url
Social login safari private mode issue
